title: #248: Mass Shooting in Canada: Correcting the Narrative
description:
Laura Richards and Jim Clemente provide insight and analysis about the horrific mass shooting in Nova Scotia, Canada on April 18 2020 and discuss with Lisa Zambetti the pattern of behaviour and warning signs of catastrophic male violence.

 

Our thoughts are with the families of the 22 victims brutally murdered in Canada.

#VictimsMatter

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
